name: Later...
description:
/!\ If you're getting low FPS check your browser's Hardware Acceleration settings, otherwise maybe try a different browser! Sorry

Controls: Mouse (Point & Click style) and Keyboard (Smash that thing down!!!)

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

Made for the Ludum Date 50

This is mostly a point and click where the player has to balance their happiness and stress level while completing their work before the deadline. 

Team : 

HenriForShort : Programming - https://twitter.com/henriforshort

Tahira Curreno : Textures & Illustrations - https://twitter.com/kizupixels/media?lang=en - https://www.instagram.com/3.5kizu/?hl=en - https://www.artstation.com/kizu

Jean-Loup Didelot : Music & SFX - https://www.instagram.com/doctorjedd/

Lucas Princé : 3D Art - https://www.artstation.com/lucasprince

Based on Tahira's life
